markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Runes](/Feats.aspx?ID=913) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runescarred](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=21)

**Prerequisites**
[Runescarred Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=912)

</column>

---

The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities. Choose a 1st-level [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell. You gain a spell rune on your body corresponding to the chosen spell, which you can cast once per day as an innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 2nd-level arcane spell, and at 8th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 3rd-level arcane spell.

<title level="2">Spell Runes leads to...</title>
[Greater Spell Runes](/Feats.aspx?ID=916)
name: Spell Runes
